name: out of control (itch)
description:
My first entry into ludumdare42
Is 2D survivor shooter game
 
The beginning of story 
Your lovely old computer had been invaded by the most dangers and harmful viruses
You the last hope
Try your best to help it before it going to running out of control and space 
Made in just feu hours 
I can’t work enough to complete everything in my head
Because I had a lot of others things to do but I’m quite happy by this game it least just prototyping
Made by
Unity2018 game engine
Adobe photoshop
Audacity
I hope you like it
please don't forget rating it
